activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12403
activity.text:
Hi team, looking to make my first contribution! My approach:

Made the following changes:

* Added red asterisk for required fields in Location and Department forms using Tailwind CSS.
* Updated button disable logic:

  * Location form: disabled if unchanged or invalid.
  * Department form: disabled if unchanged or loading.
* Used React Hook Form's `isValid` and `isDirty` for validation.

EOD: Changes done locally and self reviewed.

Approach:

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b8d82f5f-f83b-4faf-9bbc-4abb9dcfd329
